doc.previous: In the spirit of Augustine s Confessions is the 12th century Historia Calamitatum of Peter Abelard outstanding as an autobiographical document of its period
doc.after: The first autobiographical work in Islamic society was written in the late 11th century by Abdallah ibn Buluggin last Zirid king of Granada  In the 15th century Leonor L pez de C rdoba a Spanish noblewoman wrote her Memorias which may be the first autobiography in Castillian
